languages.text: {n}Вы хватаете тонкую кожу и вонзаете в нее ногти, пытаясь сцарапать с себя чужое лицо. Боль от впившихся в щеки ногтей отрезвляет — на пальцах остается кровь. Может, это и не ваше тело, но оно вам еще пригодится.{/n}

{n}You dig unfamiliar nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы хватаете тонкую кожу и вонзаете в нее ногти, пытаясь сцарапать с себя чужое лицо. Боль от впившихся в щеки ногтей отрезвляет — на пальцах остается кровь. Может, это и не ваше тело, но оно вам еще пригодится.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You dig the nails deep into the thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but that does not mean you cannot make use of it.{/n}

{n}You dig the nails deep into the thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but that does not mean you cannot make use of it.{/n}

{n}You dig "your" nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}

{n}You dig "your" nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}

{n}You dig unfamiliar nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}

{n}You dig unfamiliar nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你将陌生的指甲深深地嵌入薄薄的皮肤之中，渴望把别人的脸从你的身体上扯下去。随后，脸颊传来的疼痛让你清醒过来，你看到了手指上的鲜血。或者这具躯体确实不属于你，但它依然能在你手中派上用场。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dig unfamiliar nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你将陌生的指甲深深地嵌入薄薄的皮肤之中，渴望把别人的脸从你的身体上扯下去。随后，脸颊传来的疼痛让你清醒过来，你看到了手指上的鲜血。或者这具躯体确实不属于你，但它依然能在你手中派上用场。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hundes unas uñas desconocidas en una piel fina, tratando de arrancarte un rostro que no te pertenece. El dolor de tus mejillas tiene un efecto esclarecedor. Tienes sangre en los dedos. Puede que este no sea tu cuerpo, pero aún te puede resultar de utilidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dig unfamiliar nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hundes unas uñas desconocidas en una piel fina, tratando de arrancarte un rostro que no te pertenece. El dolor de tus mejillas tiene un efecto esclarecedor. Tienes sangre en los dedos. Puede que este no sea tu cuerpo, pero aún te puede resultar de utilidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tanımadığın tırnakları ince deriye derinlemesine geçiriyor, başkasının yüzünü kendinden kazımaya çalışıyorsun. Yanaklarındaki acının ayıltıcı bir etkisi var. Parmaklarında kan görüyorsun. Bu senin bedenin olmayabilir ama yine de sana faydası dokunabilir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dig unfamiliar nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tanımadığın tırnakları ince deriye derinlemesine geçiriyor, başkasının yüzünü kendinden kazımaya çalışıyorsun. Yanaklarındaki acının ayıltıcı bir etkisi var. Parmaklarında kan görüyorsun. Bu senin bedenin olmayabilir ama yine de sana faydası dokunabilir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは、不慣れな爪で薄い皮膚をほじくり、誰かの顔を剥がそうとする。頬の痛みで我に返る。指に血が付いているのに気づく。この体はあなたの体ではないかもしれないが、その事実もまだ役に立つかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dig unfamiliar nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは、不慣れな爪で薄い皮膚をほじくり、誰かの顔を剥がそうとする。頬の痛みで我に返る。指に血が付いているのに気づく。この体はあなたの体ではないかもしれないが、その事実もまだ役に立つかもしれない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous enfoncez profondément dans une peau fine des ongles qui vous sont inconnus, dans une tentative de gratter le visage de quelqu'un d'autre. La souffrance qui en résulte vous dégrise sur-le-champ. Vous voyez du sang sur vos doigts. Ce n'est peut-être pas votre corps, mais il peut encore vous être utile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dig unfamiliar nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous enfoncez profondément dans une peau fine des ongles qui vous sont inconnus, dans une tentative de gratter le visage de quelqu'un d'autre. La souffrance qui en résulte vous dégrise sur-le-champ. Vous voyez du sang sur vos doigts. Ce n'est peut-être pas votre corps, mais il peut encore vous être utile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst, mit fremden Nägeln das Antlitz einer fremden Person von deinem Gesicht zu kratzen. Erst deine schmerzenden Wangen holen dich in die Realität zurück. Du siehst Blut an deinen Fingern. Das ist zwar nicht dein Körper, aber er könnte sich dennoch als nützlich erweisen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You dig unfamiliar nails deep into thin skin, trying to scrape someone else's face off yourself. The pain in your cheeks has a sobering effect. You see blood on your fingers. This may not be your body, but it can still prove useful to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du versuchst, mit fremden Nägeln das Antlitz einer fremden Person von deinem Gesicht zu kratzen. Erst deine schmerzenden Wangen holen dich in die Realität zurück. Du siehst Blut an deinen Fingern. Das ist zwar nicht dein Körper, aber er könnte sich dennoch als nützlich erweisen.{/n}
